total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the two distinct regions in the grid that are filled with the same color (4).
Q2: Determine the boundaries of these two regions.
Q3: Identify the color of the cells that are located at the intersection of the horizontal and vertical lines passing through the colored cells in the first region.
Q4: Apply the same process for the second region.
Q5: Create a new grid that only includes the cells identified in Q3 and Q4, and fill the rest of the cells with the color 1.
Q6: Identify the cells in the new grid that are surrounded by cells of color 1 on three sides and fill them with the color 2.
Q7: Identify the cells in the new grid that are surrounded by cells of color 1 on two sides and fill them with the color 3.
Q8: Identify the cells in the new grid that are surrounded by cells of color 1 on one side and fill them with the color 4.
Q9: Identify the cells in the new grid that are not surrounded by cells of color 1 and fill them with the color 8.
Q1: Identify the two distinct regions in the grid that are filled with the same color (4).
Q2: Determine the boundaries of these two regions.
Q3: Identify the color (2) that forms a boundary around the first region.
Q4: Identify the color (8) that forms a boundary around the second region.
Q5: Identify the cells that are filled with color 1 within the first region.
Q6: Identify the cells that are filled with color 3 within the second region.
Q7: Identify the cells that are filled with color 7 within the first region.
Q8: Identify the cells that are filled with color 6 within the second region.
Q9: Create a new grid that only includes the cells within the boundaries identified in Q2.
Q10: In the new grid, replace the color of the cells identified in Q3 and Q4 with the color of the cells identified in Q5 and Q6 respectively.
Q11: In the new grid, replace the color of the cells identified in Q7 and Q8 with the color of the cells identified in Q5 and Q6 respectively.
Q12: In the new grid, replace the color of the cells that are not identified in Q10 and Q11 with the color 1.
